name: Line of Work
description:
PLAYABLE ONLY ON MOBILE!

Your job is to organize the blocks to create the right tetrominoes!

How to play: 

Swipe left and right to move your characters and pick the right blocks to replicate the image displayed in the topleft corner.

Hold to make the blocks fall faster

The darker blocks will help you create more complex tetronimoes, but you can't create the forms with them
